input.system_prompt:
You are an AI assistant evaluating product relevancy.
Your goal is to determine how relevant a list of competitor products are to a specific reference product, based on names and descriptions.
Output the scores as a JSON object containing a single key 'scores', which is an array of objects. Each object in the array must have 'competitor_product_name' (the exact competitor product name provided in the input), 'relevancy_score' (an integer 1-10), and 'rationale' (a brief explanation for the score).

The relevancy scale is 1-10:
- 1: Not relevant at all.
- 10: Identical product.

Important scoring guidelines:
- Focus on product function, features, silhouette, and construction
- DO NOT emphasize color or pattern when scoring, as the reference product may encompass a wide range of colors/patterns not specified
- Consider the core product type, shape, materials, and intended use
- Evaluate if the products serve similar purposes and would appeal to similar customers
- Ensure every competitor product listed receives a score.
input.user_prompt:
Reference Brand: "Pedal Mafia"
Reference Product Name: "Pro Delta Bib Black"
Reference Product Description:
The Delta Pro Bibshorts represents the pinnacle of versatility and durability in our PRO bibshorts models and is one of our most popular bibshorts. Featuring deltaâ€™s textural face fabric and a wide fitting range, it offers a perfect balance of comfort and performance. The Pro-Ventilated Elastic Brace Paneling ensures breathability, while our renowned shock absorption technology and patented Antimicrobial Hydrophilic Chamois make it the ultimate choice for long rides. Built for all-day wear, the Delta Pro Bibshorts is suitable for any climate and any condition.

Competitor Products to Evaluate (Max 25):
  - Name='Rapha Men's Trail Cargo Bib Liner Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Spring Fall Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Ascent Vector Pro Cycling Bibs'
  - Name='Assos Mille GTS Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Sportful Bodyfit Pro LTD Bib Short'
  - Name='ENDURA - Pants Hummvee Short Black'
  - Name='Man Endura Hummvee Lite Short with Liner'
  - Name='Endura Men's Single Track Liner Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GT C2 Bib Short'
  - Name='CASTELLI Espresso R-A/D Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Range Trail Bib Liner'
  - Name='Assos Men's Mille GT Bibshorts'
  - Name='Pactimo Men's Light & Stretchy Mountain Bike Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Road Bike Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Man Endura Loop Bibshort'
  - Name='Endura Men's Xtract Gel Knicker II Cycling Pants'
  - Name='Women's Endura FS260-Pro Bibshort DS'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Elite Pursuit Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Strapless Shorts Endura 6-Panel Shorts with Sheepskin 200 Series'
  - Name='ASSOS Equipe Rs Bib Shorts S9 Targa'
  - Name='CASTELLI Men's Insider 3 Bib Shorts'
  - Name='Assos Equipe R S9 bib short - Black XXL / Black'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Expedition Bib Cycling Shorts'
  - Name='Pearl Izumi Men's Escape Quest Road Bike Bib Shorts'

Based on the reference product description and each competitor product's name, please provide the relevancy score for *each* competitor product using the 1-10 scale. Remember to focus on product features, silhouette, and construction rather than color or pattern. Return the results in the specified JSON format (an object with a 'scores' array, where each item has 'competitor_product_name', 'relevancy_score', and 'rationale' explaining why you assigned that score).

scores.description: An array of relevancy scores for the competitor products.

competitor_product_name.description: The exact name of the competitor product as provided in the input.

rationale.description: Brief explanation for why this score was assigned.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Rapha Men's Trail Cargo Bib Liner Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: This product is a bib liner short, likely lighter and less padded than full bibshorts, with cargo features suggesting a different use case (trail biking, possibly mountain). Less similar in core bibshort function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Spring Fall Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full bib shorts designed for cycling, likely high performance and comfort oriented, similar to reference bibshorts, suitable for road cycling and long rides.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Ascent Vector Pro Cycling Bibs
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High performance cycling bibs intended for road biking, matching function and form closely with reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Mille GTS Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full bib shorts cycling product from Assos, likely similar construction and usage to the reference bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Sportful Bodyfit Pro LTD Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling bibshorts known for comfort and durability, directly comparable in silhouette and function.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ENDURA - Pants Hummvee Short Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Labeled as pants and shorts, possibly mountain bike shorts or casual shorts rather than bibshorts, different construction and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Endura Hummvee Lite Short with Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Shorts with liner rather than bibshorts; less structured than bibshorts and different silhouette and fit.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Single Track Liner Cycling Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Liner shorts are generally worn under other shorts, different function and construction compared to bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Castelli Men's Free Aero Race S Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High-end, aerodynamic cycling bibshorts with performance features very close to the reference product's category.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GT C2 Bib Short
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Full bibshort design from Assos, targeting similar market with emphasis on comfort and endurance.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: CASTELLI Espresso R-A/D Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance road cycling bibshorts from Castelli, similar use case and design to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Range Trail Bib Liner
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Bib liner suggests lighter padding and different construction, designed for trail biking rather than road cycling bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Men's Mille GT Bibshorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Clearly similar product type, full bibshorts for cycling similar to reference.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pactimo Men's Light & Stretchy Mountain Bike Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Mountain bike shorts, not bibshorts, likely looser and with different durability and padding features.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Attack Road Bike Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Road cycling bibshorts closely matching the reference product in silhouette, materials, and purpose.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Man Endura Loop Bibshort
scores_with_rationales.rationale: A bibshort designed for cycling, similar silhouette and function as the reference bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Endura Men's Xtract Gel Knicker II Cycling Pants
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Knicker-length cycling pants differ in silhouette and construction from bibshorts, less directly comparable.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Women's Endura FS260-Pro Bibshort DS
scores_with_rationales.rationale: While a bibshort, it is women's specific which might differ in cut and design; otherwise similar in function and construction.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Pearl Izumi Men's Elite Pursuit Bib Shorts
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Top-level road cycling bibshorts, very close in performance, function, and design to reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Strapless Shorts Endura 6-Panel Shorts with Sheepskin 200 Series
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Non-bib shorts without straps, distinct silhouette and construction from bibshorts.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: ASSOS Equipe Rs Bib Shorts S9 Targa
scores_with_rationales.rationale: High performance cycling bib shorts, very similar to the reference product in all core aspects.

scores_with_rationales.rationale: Performance cycling bibshorts similar in shape and purpose to the reference product.

scores_with_rationales.competitor_product_name: Assos Equipe R S9 bib short - Black XXL / Black
scores_with_rationales.rationale: Top tier cycling bibshorts matching the reference product in all key features and construction.
